etri.sdn.controller

Class OFModel.RESTApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.OFModel.RESTApi
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OFModel.RESTWebUI
    Enclosing class:
    OFModel

    public class OFModel.RESTApi
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a superclass of all REST API implementations.
    Author:
    bjlee

      • OFModel.RESTApi

        public OFModel.RESTApi(java.lang.String uri,
               org.restlet.Restlet api)

        api -

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        returns the type of the RESTApi object.
        Returns:
        String that represents the RESTApi object type. Other than OFModel.RESTWebUI, this method always returns "api".

      • getURI

        public java.lang.String getURI()
        returns a URI associated with this RESTApi object.
        Returns:
        String (URI)

      • getAPI

        public org.restlet.Restlet getAPI()
        returns a Restlet object that actually implements the api.
        Returns:
        Restlet object
